name: PowerShell as a Service in Registry
description: Detects that a powershell code is written to the registry as a service.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Services\\* AND registry.path:*\\ImagePath AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*powershell* OR *pwsh*))`
